definition: stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
Flying Tigers, US airmen in China during World War Two/Hong Kong nickname for police special duties unit
Yang Hucheng (1893-1949), Chinese warlord and Nationalist general
the Bocca Tigris, a narrow strait in the Pearl River Delta, Guangdong/Humen Town 虎門鎮|虎门镇[Hu3 men2 Zhen4]
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia
tiger's den/dangerous place/the web between the thumb and forefinger of a hand

sentences.english: Its emblem changed from the bird to the snake, and then tot…
sentences.chinese: 巴人之族徽由鸟而蛇而虎，最终以白虎为图腾。

sentences.english: Give a monkey a tree, give a tiger a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 给猴一棵树，给虎一座山。

sentences.english: AnShan tiger surveillance to meet with dao Yin CuiGuoHuan confidential and report to RenHui.
sentences.chinese: 安善虎监视到道贤跟崔国焕机密见面，汇报给仁惠。

sentences.english: He was a young Khajiit that went by the name of Khadunm.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个年轻的虎人，名字叫做哈顿穆。

sentences.english: First it was India's Tata Motors ( TTM) that bought Jaguar and Land Rover from Ford ( F) last year.
sentences.chinese: 早先是去年印度的塔塔汽车从福特买下了捷豹和路虎。

sentences.english: When baby tigers are born, they live with their mothers for two years.
sentences.chinese: 幼虎出生后通常先和母虎在一起生活两年。

sentences.english: Beyond the tigers, there are populations of many other rare animals.
sentences.chinese: 除了印度虎，这里还有许多其他罕见的动物。

sentences.english: The tiger retired to its den.
People look at a giant white tiger set up for the Daegwallyeong Snow Festival in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韩国平昌的冰雪节上，人们正在看着一尊虎冰雕。

sentences.english: Nanquan, also known as tiger respect boxing.
Black means black without a trace of brindle.
sentences.chinese: 黑色是指黑色不带虎斑。

sentences.english: Or maybe a pretty tabby cat purring on your lap?
sentences.chinese: 还是一只可爱的虎斑猫在你大腿上打呼噜？

sentences.english: In fact, most moms there are tigers.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，大都数中国母亲都是虎妈。

sentences.english: On the island, in the sea, tiger's will.
sentences.chinese: 在岛上，在海中，虎的意志。

sentences.english: Two tiger cubs are born in the ruins of a South-East Asian Buddhist temple, each with very different personalities.
sentences.chinese: 在东南亚一座佛教寺庙的废墟中，一对虎兄弟出生了。

sentences.english: It is fortunate that such change have really existed in the Photo tigers.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，这些变化确实存在于照片虎中。
